entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 09:44 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 then light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
